ygData.subject: Re: Cleric Behaviour
ygData.msgSnippet: aye..i ve done this.....the only times i ve done this is if i m not in a group, or waiting on someone...usually, if i m in a group, we re getting ready to
ygData.messageBody:
aye..i've done this.....the only times i've done this is if i'm not in a group,
or waiting on someone...usually, if i'm in a group, we're getting ready to fight
something, so i kinda need to save my mana for group heals....i do try to help
ppl tho if it's within my ability and time

(\/)ystix Spellchaser
lv 49 human cleric of The Rathe

AsmodeusDP@... wrote:

> From: AsmodeusDP@...
>
> I'm new to this mail list, and thought I would introduce myself with a topic
> to discuss. I've often wondered what exactly it means to be a cleric in
> Norrath. My personal opinion is that we should always be merciful to those
> around us, and help in any way we can. Even if to heal someone we don't even
> know completely depletes our mana. What do you think of this?
>
> Nofur<Pact of Aegis> of Karana
